testCase.name: POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should return the 201 status code
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should return valid json response
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should persist the user in the database
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should return an id of the created user
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should assign a customer role
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should store the hashed password in the database
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should return 400 status code if email is already exits
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should return the access token and refresh token inside a cookie
POST /api/auth/register Given all fields should store the refresh token in the database
POST /api/auth/register Fields are missing should return 400 status code if email field is missing
POST /api/auth/register Fields are missing should return 400 status code if firstName field is missing
POST /api/auth/register Fields are missing should return 400 status code if lastName field is missing
POST /api/auth/register Fields are missing should return 400 status code if password field is missing
POST /api/auth/register Fields are missing should return 400 status code if password length is less than 8 characters
POST /api/auth/register Fields are not in proper format should trim the email field
GET /api/auth/self Given all fields should return the 200 status code
GET /api/auth/self Given all fields should return the user data
GET /api/auth/self Given all fields should not return password field
GET /api/auth/self Given all fields should return 401 status code it token does not exit
POST /api/tenants Given all fields should return a 201 status code
POST /api/tenants Given all fields should create a tenant in the database
POST /api/tenants Given all fields should return 401 is user is not authenticated
POST /api/tenants Given all fields should return 403 if the user is not an admin
POST /api/auth/login Given all fields should logout the user
POST /api/users Given all fields should persist the user in the database
POST /api/users Given all fields should create a manager user
POST /api/auth/login Given all fields should login the user
POST /api/auth/login Given all fields should return the 400 if email or password is wrong
POST /api/auth/refresh Given all fields should return access token if refresh token is valid
